profile.name: profile @User
profile.description: Shows the information about a user's profile (or about you, if nobody's mentioned).

money.name: money
money.description: Shows the amount of money you have.

rules.name: rules [command]
rules.description: Show the rules about a game. (Example: >rules slot)

give.name: give @User [number]
give.description: Give the mentioned user the specified amount of money.

slot.name: slot [number]
slot.description: Play slot machine with a bet amount of [number]. (Example: >slot 100)

blackjack.name: blackjack [number]
blackjack.description: Play blackjack with a bet amount of [number]. (Example: >blackjack 100)
